1573620.name: Bit Orchard
1573620.description:
You finally bought the apple orchard you have always wanted. It is old and overgrown, but with some care it can become something special.

Clear weeds, plant apple trees, and keep watch for hungry crows. Harvest apples to earn money, upgrade your house, and expand your land as your orchard grows!

The surrounding town has opened its doors to you. Meet the local residents, help them with small tasks, and raise your friendship level. As your relationships grow, each character invites you into their home where you can play a unique mini game created just for them.

You can buy chickens, collect and sell eggs, incubate eggs to hatch new chicks, or make mayonnaise for a higher profit.

For players who like to explore, a small mine waits beneath the earth. Work your way down through multiple levels to gather crystals, money, and fiber, and search for rare decorations that add personality to your orchard.

The game includes a variety of color palettes and music tracks that can be swapped at any time to suit your mood. There is also an optional open farm mode that removes some of the early game grind for a faster start.

The visuals use a crisp one bit pixel style inspired by the original Game Boy, paired with simple controls and a relaxed, cozy pace. Fans of small scale life sim and farming games like Stardew Valley or Forager may enjoy its minimalist charm and focus on tending a quiet space of your own.

Build up your orchard at your own speed and watch a neglected plot of land turn into a thriving little orchard.

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
